hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout with Liquidity Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: During extended NEUTRAL regimes (7+ days), when BTC 20-day realized volatility compresses below 35% and is accompanied by sudden liquidity expansion in options markets (25-delta skew normalization), a directional breakout occurs within 3 days with 70% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Options market liquidity expansion indicates smart money positioning for impending volatility. The combination of spot compression and options activity provides high-confidence breakout signals. Neutral regimes allow this setup to develop without being overridden by existing trends.
entry_conditions: 25-delta skew for 7-day options normalizes from >5 to 2-4 range
Options open interest increases >15% in 24 hours
Spot volume remains below average (confirming compression)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Return to volatility compression (<40% RV) without breakout

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If volatility remains compressed indefinitely without breakout (range-bound forever), or if options activity becomes decoupled from spot due to structural changes in derivatives markets.
